com.mumfrey.liteloader.modconfig

Interface AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField

  • Enclosing class:
    AbstractConfigPanel

    public static interface AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField
    A handle to an option text field, used to get and retrieve text and set the max length. It is possible to obtain the native text field as well, however caution should be used when doing so to avoid breaking the contract of the text field wrapper used in the config panel itself.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GuiTextField getNativeTextField()
      Get the inner text field
      java.lang.String getText()
      Get the text field's text
      boolean isValid()
      If the validation regex is not set, always returns true.
      AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField setMaxLength(int maxLength)
      Set the max allowed string length, defaults to 32
      AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField setRegex(java.lang.String regex, boolean force)
      Set a validation regex for this text box.
      AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField setText(java.lang.String text)
      Set the text field's text

    • Method Detail

      • getNativeTextField

        GuiTextField getNativeTextField()
        Get the inner text field

      • getText

        java.lang.String getText()
        Get the text field's text

      • setText

        AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField setText(java.lang.String text)
        Set the text field's text
        Parameters:
        text - text to set
        Returns:
        fluent interface

      • setRegex

        AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField setRegex(java.lang.String regex,
                                             boolean force)
        Set a validation regex for this text box.
        Parameters:
        regex - Validation regex to use for this text field
        force - If set to false, invalid values will only cause the text field to display an error when invalid text is present. If set to true, invalid values will be forcibly prohibited from being entered.
        Returns:
        fluent interfaces

      • isValid

        boolean isValid()
        If the validation regex is not set, always returns true. Otherwise returns true if the current text value matches the validation regex.
        Returns:
        validation state of the current text value

      • setMaxLength

        AbstractConfigPanel.ConfigTextField setMaxLength(int maxLength)
        Set the max allowed string length, defaults to 32
        Parameters:
        maxLength - max string length to use
        Returns:
        fluent interface
